title: Towards Accurate UAV Image Perception: Guiding Vision-Language Models with Stronger Task Prompts
summary: Existing image perception methods based on VLMs generally follow a paradigm wherein models extract and analyze image content based on user-provided textual task prompts. However, such methods face limitations when applied to UAV imagery, which presents challenges like target confusion, scale variations, and complex backgrounds.
